Posts.Content: Feb 11, 2010 04:44AM Micheleann wrote: Hi I've had one treatment of abraxane today will b m 2nd. I've had severe joint n bone muscle pain it started 6 hrs after infusion had to pop vicodin every 4 his n couldn't move I hurt so bad. I'm not a whimp ether. I finally have hair past m eats and I'm with you sister I hate ill loose my hair . I will put up with side effects cause I heard the drug works.I have fatigue also I'm a nurse I want to keep working but I think I can't. Wishing you luck michele

Posts.Content: Micheleann wrote: Email me at songbirdmuch@aol.com and I will send you a song. Free. I cowrote called "stand up and fight" I am a recording artist this song will be on sale on itunes for a charity called "rock pink" I am now living the song again when I wrote it ididnt have mets. I also use to be a chemo nurse for 10 yrs I'm oyt of oncology n in critical care now 6 yrs so when I read your forum u give me hope back when I was an oncology nurse my diagnosis prognosis would be death. Breast cancer has come a lobg way. Visit my website add me tell me u met me here. www.myspace.com/micheleannn. Hope to her from you all. I had surg yest they put in a new port I'm hurtin I hated the port in 08 n I hate it more now. Chemo starys fri.now here is the question do I keep working as. Nurse or go on full disability n just sing with my band. Nrw chemo don't know how ill feel. I have lung mets 7 nodules.
